feat.name: Fire
feat.text: Incandescent: (Fire, Light) Ability Score Increases: | +1 Str, +1 Cha | Ablaze (Active): Use an action. All allies within a 30ft. radius gain +[2(Elelvl)] Str. This lasts for 10 minutes.
